name: Self Acceptance = True
description:
Being different is not easy in the society we live in.

As a personal experience, the moment you identify yourself as gay, lesbian, trans or any deviation from the norm, you tend to shut down your true nature and deny yourself.

For the very few lucky ones out there, this process is just a matter of time, energy and finally self acceptance. But the vast majority out there are engulfed in what is dictated as "right" and "normal".

Self Acceptance = True is a short game developed for the Raibow Game Jam 2016.
